alert.note: Alert for Osage (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 12:55PM CDT until July 17 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN OSAGE COUNTY... At 1255 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles west of Pawhuska, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations in or near the path include... Pawhuska... Hominy... Barnsdall... Wynona... Osage Hills State Park... Pearsonia... Okesa... Sunset Lake... Pershing... Nelagoney... Tallant... TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
